text:
Hey all , i wanted to add the chat bot to my reactNextjs application
and I believe <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/chat-widget-sdk> this would be a way to it.

but I want to be sure and I want to know does tracking code enables HubSpot in my site ?

how is window.HubSpotConversations loaded exactly ? because I'm not using an NPM module or anything.

I have just added my tracking code to my website in _document.js file
